# audubon <a href='https://paithiov909.github.io/audubon'><img src='man/figures/logo.png' align="right" height="139" /></a>

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

audubon is an R package for various Japanese text processing that contains:

- wrapper functions of [hakatashi/japanese.js](https://github.com/hakatashi/japanese.js)
- wrapper functions of [yumetodo/romaji_kana_cvt_rust](https://github.com/yumetodo/romaji_kana_cvt_rust) (an Roman and Hiragana inverter following the JIS X 4063:2000)
- an R port of [SudachiCharNormalizer](https://gist.github.com/sorami/bde9d441a147e0fc2e6e5fdd83f4f770)
- and other miscellaneous functions

## System Requirements

- Cargo

## Installation

```r
remotes::install_github("paithio909/audubon")
```
